tool_description: Unleash the Power of Text Extraction from Images with a Single API Call! Convert PNG, JPG, BMP, and PBM Images into Editable Text Effortlessly.
name: Image To Text
title: Image To Text

api_list.name: Extract Text From Image
api_list.description: Extract text from png, jpg, bmp and pbm images with just a simple API call.

required_parameters.name: image
required_parameters.description: The URL to the image you want to extract text from. Please use only PNG, JPG, BMP or PBM formats.
